General.Name: Performance Technologies S.A.
General.Description: Performance Technologies S.A. provides IT Solutions in Greece. The company offers hybrid IT solutions, which include infrastructure, virtualization, data protection, application platforms, DC automation, and cloud solutions; network, mobility and IoT solutions comprising campus networking, DC networks, locations, mobile workplace, and mobile application testing; security and information governance, such as data discovery and classification, encryption and masking, identity and access management, application security, and general data protection regulation; and enterprise service management and DevOps solutions including IT and enterprise service management, business process management, unified operations management, digital experience management, asset management, DevOps and test automation, and process automation. It also offers big data and analytics solutions; and education services comprising Red Hat, VMware, and Veritas training services. Performance Technologies S.A. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.
